transactionDescription.helpText: The text here will be the title of the report and should be entered in the following format: Currency, Facility, Amount, Facility Ranking (e.g. Senior Mezzanine) credit facilities/credit facility to Borrower Name

questions.questionText: Select from a list of commonly used lenders
Enter Additional Lenders
questions.helpText: Use this field to enter lenders not listed in 1.1 above.  Each lender should be separated by a semi-colon.  If no lender is chosen from 1.1, you must enter at least one lender in this field.

questionContainers.containerText: Does the credit agreement contain obligations for the borrower to provide the following to the agent/lenders:

questions.questionText: All documents dispatched by the borrower to its shareholders or its creditors generally?
Details of any litigation, arbitration or administrative proceedings?
Notification of any default?
Further information on request regarding the financial condition, business or operations of any member of the group?
Notification of any change in ownership/shareholding of the group?
Notification of any changes in the constitutive documents of any obligor?
Consolidated annual financial statements?
Consolidated semi-annual financial statements?
Consolidated quarterly financial statements?
Consolidated monthly financial statements?
Unconsolidated annual financial statements?
